system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Flexible Weapons)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.CtOnKnVw64DAHqWV]{Flexible Weapon Martial Arts}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.8OANgyHptfBa9V8v]{Flexible Weapon Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding a bullwhip, weighted chain, chain whip, nunchaku, or three-section staff, the Critical Threat Range is 12-18 and any natural roll of 15-18 is an automatic hit. Additionally, if a character successfully disarms a target using one of these weapons they may cause the disarmed object to fall anywhere within their weapon’s reach instead of at the target’s feet, and the penalty for attacking into the flank or rear area with these weapons is reduced by 5.
system.summary: 12-18 crit, 15-18 auto hit, disarm fling, reduced facing penalties
